data.message: Safety system now has 9 invariants (S1-S9) all enforced at host level via Hookify. S9 (fail-closed) is the capstone - system refuses to operate without guardrails. This closes the "security cosplay" gap where verification warned but didn't block. The maintenance triad is complete: test-safety-gates.py (21 tests), verify-safety-system.py (5 checks), test-fail-closed.py (3 tests), restore-hooks.py (3 hooks).
